item.title: MySQL
item.description: I learnt some important query methods that will help to do basic research. Also, the ability to obtain specific columns that are required rather than the entire dataset from the database

item.title: Data Science
item.description: This course is one of the best bootcamps for data science. Because every lesson has an assessment. So learning became more interesting and beneficial.

item.title: Python
item.description: This course is the foundation of my data science journey. It was a two-month live class offered by Edureka.
